teamBuff.name: Outro Skill: Windcalling Tune
teamBuff.desc: {Aero Erosion} DMG dealt to targets near the active Resonator is Amplified by 100% for 30s.

teamBuff.name: Solo Concert
teamBuff.desc: When Ciaccona or Ensemble Sylph performs {Solo Concert}, they give 24% Aero DMG Bonus to all nearby Resonators in the team. This effect is not stackable.

teamBuff.name: Sequence Node 2: Song of the Four Seasons
teamBuff.desc: During Resonance Liberation {Singer's Triple Cadenza}, Resonators in the team gain 40% Aero DMG Bonus.
